synopsis: Professor Agasa is kidnapped and the Detective Boys must use clues found at his house and in various parts of the city in order to find him.

title.en: Case Closed  OVA 07: A Challenge from Agasa! Agasa vs. Conan and the Detective Boys
title.jp: Detective Conan OVA 07: A Challenge from Agasa! Agasa vs. Conan and the Detective Boys
